post:
SerNet Hosting offer premium web hosting packages, all web hosting packages come with unlimited bandwidth and unlimited addon domains, so you are only limited by storage capacities!
 
All of our plans include daily backups and SSD site storage and is powered by DirectAdmin.
 
NOW $0.99/ mo

These can be ordered at https://sernethosting.com/web-hosting
 
 
Along with these web packages we also offer reseller web hosting, these plans include a free WHMCS starter licence and are hidden under our white-labelled hostname. These allow unlimited accounts again only capped by the storage limited by our plans.
 
*Please note the WHMCS licence is for internal use only
 
Mod Edit: Offending package(s) removed.

These plans can be ordered at https://sernethosting.com/reseller-web-hosting
 
If you have any questions, reach out to us on our website: https://sernethosting.com/support
